Featuring a fruity opening note of pear, the fragrance then develops to a heart of the floral and elegant jasmine. The perfume finishes with a sweet note of honey, which instantly transforms the scent into a beautiful addiction. A new Scandal A Paris leaves a trail of fearlessness as well as countless rumors as you move. A Scandal in a bottle: an outrageously radiant essence that reveals light pink through a clear glass. This iconic image perfectly anticipates the unforgettable scent you&amp;#39;re about to try! Notes Top notes: pear; Heart notes: jasmine; Base notes: honey.

Drawing on the grace and distinction of the world&rsquo;s most beloved flower, this damask rose perfume is prized for its highly complex alchemy, lending itself to an infinite number of compositions. Heady and intense, both soft and potent, this is a floral fragrance unlike any other

name: PASSAGE D'ENFER By Olivia Giacobetti L'Artisan Parfumeur
description: Toilette Passage d&rsquo;Enfer pays homage to the Parisian location of L&rsquo;Artisan Parfumeur&rsquo;s office in the 1970s. It conjures up images of chilled cathedral walls and echoes of rituals and incantations. Translucent lily and white musk sweeten the balsamic smoke of incense. Passage d&rsquo;Enfer is also a wicked play on words, the symbolic &ldquo;Hells passage&rdquo;, a moment caught between two worlds. The name may be dark and unsettling, but the scent itself is tranquil and contemplative.&nbsp; Passage d&rsquo;Enfer is a subtle elixir based on incense essence, an exquisite, woody and aromatic raw material. Pure, airy and all-consuming, it attracts and seduces, conjuring up dream-like, voluptuous, poetic and sensual moments of pleasure.

The perfume boasts a hand-made clear glass bottle enriched with the name of the fragrance written in a gold tone. Fragrance Notes: Moroccan rose, ambroxan, amber, incense, cashmere wood, tobacco, musk &nbsp;

The fragrance opens with a burst of bright and sparkling top notes, beginning with blue basil&ndash;a botanical ingredient developed exclusively for Tiffany&ndash;paired with grapefruit for an aromatic crispness. The sweet floral bouquet of neroli is at the heart of the fragrance, with a woody blend of blue sequoia. Vetiver and cedarwood are at the base, creating a faceted and feminine scent. Personalize this bottle with custom engraving to make it the perfect gift. description: About Jo Malone London Wild Bluebell Scent Surround Diffuser Fill your room with the scent of vibrant sapphire blooms in a shaded woodland. The delicate sweetness of dewy bluebells suffused with lily of the valley, eglantine, and a luscious twist of persimmon. Delicate, dewy, and mesmerising. Why It&rsquo;s Special Create a fragrant scene in your home with the dewy, delicate scent of wild bluebells Place on your bedside table or dresser to encourage a relaxing mood Jo Malone London diffusers add continuous scent to any space for 4-5 months Genderless How to Use Twist off the cap. Remove the black seal from the metal collar and replace the collar. Gently tap the reeds on a hard surface and then dip them into the oil. The greater number of reeds used, the more intense the scent. Allow 24-36 hours for the fragrance to diffuse fully. Enjoy your diffuser for up to 4-5 months.

description: Giorgio Armani My Way EDP is an absolutely wonderful feminine fragrance that takes you on probably the most important journey of your life. Namely, to find yourself and your own path through all your experiences and acquaintances. This fragrance has a sensational and uplifting effect on both body and mind, and inspires you to get to know your best sides through nature and other people, so that they can radiate. A timeless scent that with its notes shows that you are an open and curious person who is ready to learn and who is finding his own way in life. The notes in this rich fragrance include tuberose, orange blossom and Indian jasmine, which are the ones that open the fragrance and embrace the body in a wonderful way. Then the bergamot, the white musk, the sweet vanilla and the warm cedar come into their own. They are the ones that collect the scent, and make it more deep and harmonious, and give the final tingle that pushes you out on your journey.

name: BYREDO Mojave Ghost 100ML
description: In the xeric wilderness of the Mojave desert, trees and vegetation more ancient than many civilizations defy conditions that prey on human vulnerability. The ghost flower is a rare species that dares to blossom above this baked, hard ground. Despite its arid surroundings and inability to produce nectar, the ghost flower, or mohavea confertiflora, maintains its perfect, majestic beauty and thrives year after year. In an astonishing feat of ingenuity, the flower uses mimicry to attract the pollinators of a neighboring plant species by developing markings that resemble those of a female bee genus attracted to its subject and duping the male bee into following suit. This moving human-like behavior and captivating tale of survival lies in the foundation that inspired Mojave Ghost, an homage to this most bewitching flower. Style: Woody, aromatic. Notes: - Top: ambrette, Jamaican nesberry. - Middle: violet, sandalwood, magnolia. - Base: chantilly musk, crisp amber, cedarwood.

name: Narciso Rodriguez For Her EDP 50ML
description: Narciso for Her perfume is created for very sensitive, delicate and free modern women. The aroma is filled with notes of musk and enhanced with floral, woody and amber notes, which are combined to create the effect of sexuality, charm and mystery. Aroma type: musky, floral. Top notes: orange, coriander, Egyptian musk. Heart notes: bergamot, osmanthus, vanilla. Base notes: vetiver, flower honey, amber.

name: Narciso Rodriguez Generous Spray EDP Poudrée, 75ml
description: Enjoy the graciousness that is Narciso Rodriguez&amp;#39;s limited edition Generous Spray. An enveloping mist of our best-selling fragrances. The mystery of attraction captured in a fragrance. The rendez-vous between velvety jamine, sensual wood and powdery musc. Fragrance family: Powdery, musky, floral, woody Top Notes: white jasmine petals &amp;amp;amp; Bulgarian rose Heart Notes: powdery heart of musc Base Notes: white and black cedars, vetiver.

name: Narciso Rodriguez Generous Spray Rouge EDP 75ML
description: Enjoy the graciousness that is Narciso Rodriguez&amp;#39;s limited edition Generous Spray. An enveloping mist of our best-selling fragrances. A fragrance that explores the fine art of temptation further. &nbsp; The signature heart of musc is animated by an exquisite floral bouquet of bulgarian rose, iris and vivid amber woody notes. &nbsp; Fragrance family: Ambery, floral, musky, woody. Top Notes: bulgarian rose and iris Heart Notes: heart of musc Base Notes: Tonka, Vetiver, Black cedar / White cedar &nbsp;

name: Narciso Rodriguez Generous Spray Fleur Musc for Her EDP 75ML
description: Enjoy the graciousness that is Narciso Rodriguez&amp;#39;s limited edition Generous Spray. An enveloping mist of our best-selling fragrances. The for her signature heart of musc is surrounded by roses, spices, and amber wood, to create a sparkling fragrance. Fragrance family: Spicy, musky, floral, chypre. Top Notes: Bouquet of roses and pink Peppercorns Heart Notes: Heart of Musc Base Notes: Amber, Patchouli

name: Amouage Interlude Man EDP Spray (Tester Box)
description: Amouage Interlude Man is inspired by chaos and disorder. This spicy and woody fragrance opens with zesty bergamot, oregano and pimento berry oil, perpetuating intervals of conflict which are countered by aromatic notes of amber, frankincense, opoponax, cistus and myrrh. Eternal notes of leather, agarwood smoke, patchouli and sandalwood in the base add lasting layers of depth and texture. Made in Oman.

name: BYREDO x Off-White Elevator Music Limited
type: Dapatkan promosi dan berita tebaru dari kami.

name: MISS DIOR EAU DE PARFUM 100ML
description: The new Miss Dior Eau de Parfum reveals the femininity of a sensual floral. Its heart is a floral declaration that combines the beauty of Grasse rose with the boldness of Damascus rose, both wrapped in a ribbon of fresh notes of Calabrian bergamot. This handcrafted creation is woven with rosewood from French Guiana and pink pepper from Reunion Island for heightened character. A Miss Dior that will leave you&nbsp;lovestruck.

name: Versace Bright Crystal Eau De Toilette Spray 30ML
description: Sheer sensuality, crystal transparency, and luminous brightness: Versace introduces Bright Crystal, a precious jewel of rare beauty characterized by a fresh, vibrant, flowery scent. The bottle is extraordinary: rich glass, lines purposely essential, the transparency of which enhances the pinky delicacy of the fragrance. The very elegant crystal cap, faceted and bright like a diamond, seals a bouquet of extreme pureness. Bright Crystal is bursting with juicy notes of pomegranate, pretty magnolia, peony and lotus flowers with amber and musk.

name: Bvlgari Man Glacial Essence Eau de Parfum
description: BVLGARI MAN GLACIAL ESSENCE enriches the Bvlgari Man collection dedicated to the power of natural elements. After fire and wood, Bvlgari Man explores air. BVLGARI MAN GLACIAL ESSENCE captures the unbridled magnitude of the frozen mountains and the unstoppable masculinity of a man on a constant quest for greatness. Top notes are Juniper Berries, Ginger and Geranium; middle notes are Sandalwood, Artemisia and Orris Root; base notes are Clearwood, Musk and Cedar.

name: CHANCE Eau Fraiche by Chanel
description: A floral-sparkling fragrance in a round bottle. A surge of energy that sweeps you into a whirlwind of happiness and fantasy. An olfactory encounter with chance. A floral-sparkling fragrance that intertwines the zesty freshness of Citron, the softness of Jasmine and the vibrant presence of Teak Wood. A whirlwind of energy and vitality.

name: Bvlgari BLV Pour Homme Eau De Toilette Spray
description: mp;nbsp; From icy cold to luxuriously warm, BLV Pour Homme is a fresh, woody and spicy Eau de Toilette. Built around the same unconventional ingredient as BLV-ginger-and combined with tobacco flower, BLV Pour Homme discloses an irresistible power of seduction.

name: Bvlgari Eau Parfumee Au The Bleu Eau de Cologne - Unisex
description: Eau Parfumee au The Bleu by Bvlgari is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. Eau Parfumee au The Bleu was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniela (Roche) Andrier. Top notes are Lavender and Shiso; middle notes are Tea and Violet; base notes are iris and Musk.

name: Bvlgari Eau Parfumee au The Noir for Women - Eau de Cologne
description: de Cologne Bvlgari Eau Parfumee Au The Noir Perfume by Bvlgari, Created by French perfumer Jacques Cavallier, the unisex Eau Parfumee Au The Noir (black tea) is an Oriental woody perfume with an elegant black tea aroma and deep tobacco and leather scents. The opening floral notes come from rose while the citrus notes are derived from citrus bergamia, otherwise known as bergamot orange. Magnolia and tea provide the floral and green center notes while the base notes consist of leather, patchouli, and oud, or agarwood, which is a fragrant, expensive wood that is often used to make high quality incense.

name: Dior Addict Eau Fraîche 50ML
description: A crisp botanic fragrance with an oriental trail and &amp;#39;second skin&amp;#39; feel. Dior Addict Eau Fraiche radiates a glowing femininity. Top notes of gentle Calabrian Bergamot and the sweet and sour citrus notes of Grapefruit blend into the elegant floral notes of Freesia and Lily of the Valley. Ending on a sensuous woody, white musk base, Dior Addict Eau Fra&icirc;che is a fresh, feminine experience.

name: Dior Addict Eau de Parfum 50ML
description: Dior Addict Eau de Parfum (2014) by Dior is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Dior Addict Eau de Parfum (2014)was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Francois Demachy. Top notes are Mandarin Leaf and Orange Blossom; middle note is Jasmine Sambac; base note is Bourbon Vanilla.

name: Bvlgari Allegra Magnifying Bergamot EDP 40ML
description: MAGNIFYING comprises of precious tailor-made ingredients to intensify magnificent Italian emotions. As their name suggests, these essences are highly concentrated, powerful and vibrant, an expression of true exclusivity. The citrus essence bursts with solar energy. To achieve this especially bright distillation, Calabrian bergamot is harvested when it&rsquo;s perfectly ripe. Fresh-picked, the bergamot contains sweet and crisp notes. Distilled to retain the fruit&rsquo;s multi-faceted freshness, MAGNIFYING BERGAMOT exudes the upbeat promise of a gorgeous summer&amp;#39;s day. &nbsp;

name: Bvlgari Allegra Magnifying Musk EDP 40ML
description: MAGNIFYING comprises of precious tailor-made ingredients to intensify magnificent Italian emotions. As their name suggests, these essences are highly concentrated, powerful and vibrant, an expression of true exclusivity. The warm and sultry essence of MAGNIFYING MUSK is inspired by the intimate feel of touch. Crafted with ambrette, the deceptively simple musk reveals a sophisticated radiance. With its notable and expressive luminosity, Magnifying Musk recalls the dazzling joy of an embrace.

name: Bvlgari Allegra Magnifying Patchouli EDP 40ML
description: MAGNIFYING comprises of precious tailor-made ingredients to intensify magnificent Italian emotions. As their name suggests, these essences are highly concentrated, powerful and vibrant, an expression of true exclusivity. The elegant essence of MAGNIFYING PATCHOULI enchants with a stark sensuality. Made with patchouli sourced from Indonesia, the opulent distillation is of unprecedented quality, free of any dark, earthy notes by exclusive fractionation. Enriched with woody and chypre facets, Magnifying Patchouli rouses a precious and powerful seduction.

name: Bvlgari Allegra Magnifying Rose EDP 40ML
description: MAGNIFYING comprises of precious tailor-made ingredients to intensify magnificent Italian emotions. As their name suggests, these essences are highly concentrated, powerful and vibrant, an expression of true exclusivity. The floral essence of MAGNIFYING ROSE entices with a velvety, voluptuous intensity. Unlike a classic, powdery rose, this blend of Bulgarian and Turkish roses boasts a remarkable radiance, thanks to a unique fragmentation of essential oils with an unusual distillation. With a sparkle refined by subtle woody notes, Magnifying Rose delivers a luscious bouquet full of the optimism of love.

name: Bvlgari Allegra Magnifying Vanilla EDP 40ML
description: MAGNIFYING comprises of precious tailor-made ingredients to intensify magnificent Italian emotions. As their name suggests, these essences are highly concentrated, powerful and vibrant, an expression of true exclusivity. The delicately sweet essence of MAGNIFYING VANILLA tantalises, with vanilla beans imported from Madagascar. To develop the fruit&rsquo;s most complex and nuanced facets, it&rsquo;s dried in the sun. Raw, leathery and sexy notes culminate in an addictive aroma, and Magnifying Vanilla ignites an irresistible attraction.

name: HERMES L'Ombre des Merveilles Eau de parfum - UNISEX
description: The intense radiance of a chiariscuro fragrance, both woody and oriental.The sensuality of tonka bean and incense emphasized by deep notes of black tea.Olfactory emotion: Spicy, DryMain raw materials: Tonka bean, Black tea, Incense

name: HERMES Eau des Merveilles Eau de toilette
description: An enchanting perfume, warm and sparkling.A fragrance composed of smooth, vanilla toned benzoin and ambergris woody notes, a wonderful stroll in the refreshing cool of wild orange trees.Olfactory emotion: Spicy, DryMain raw materials: Elemi, Benzoin, Bitter orange

name: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Collector's Edition EDP (Dress Me Wild)
description: Libre Collector Edition is a new and limited perfume by Yves Saint Laurent&nbsp;in a collector&amp;#39;s bottle for women and was released in 2020 The sexy, cool, and floral &ldquo;dress me wild&rdquo; edition opens with notes of lavender, mandarin, and neroli in the opening notes; in the heart are orange and jasmine flowers, while the base combines vanilla, tonka, and white musk. &nbsp;

name: Black Opium Shine On Yves Saint Laurent - Limited Edition
description: Black Opium Shine On by Yves Saint Laurent is a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Black Opium Shine On was launched in 2019. Black Opium Shine On was created by Nathalie Lorson, Marie Salamagne, Olivier Cresp and Honorine Blanc. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Orange Blossom and Pear; middle notes are Coffee, Jasmine, Almond and Licorice; base notes are Vanilla, Patchouli, Cashmere Wood and Cedar.

name: Black Opium EDP Holiday Collector Bottle Edition
description: To celebrate the festive season, YSL Beauty offers a wild twist on a holiday classic: Black Opium, now dressed in NEW glittering limited edition pattern. The NEW Black Opium collector houses the much-loved Black Opium original Eau de Parfum. A captivating floral gourmand scent, twisted with an overdose of black coffee, for a shot of adrenaline. Energy, sensuality, coupled with that unique YSL edge.The signature black coffee accord is paired with creamy vanilla, enriched by the softness of white flowers and orange blossom, against a base of patchouli and comforting white musk, for a women&rsquo;s fragrance that bewitches with its trail. Crafted by Marie Salamagne, Nathalie Lorson, Olivier Cresp and Honorine Blanc. &bull; Top notes: pear accord, mandarin essence&bull; Heart notes: vanilla, orange blossom, white flowers&bull; Base notes: black coffee accord, cedarwood essence, white musk, patchouli

name: Nomade by CHLOE 75ml EDP
description: Chlo&eacute; Nomade Eau de Parfum encapsulates the spirit of a woman open to the beauty of the World, who flourishes through her experiences and encounters. A perfume with an intense character of oak moss, shrouded in the sweetness of cherry plum and the freshness of freesia.

name: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet 50ML
description: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Eau de Toilette is a delicate and playful scent that truly feels like spring in a bottle and that embodies the Miss Dior spirit perfectly. As its antecedents, the Dior Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Eau de Toilette has a sophisticated flask that immediately reminds us of the couture luxurious spirit. Introduce this enchanting scent as your daily perfume, and complement its use with other products from the same range in order to enhance its fragrance trail. Top notes: sicilian mandarin, calabrian bergamot; Heart notes: pink peony, damask rose, apricot and peach; Base notes: white musk.

name: TERRE D'HERMES EDT 50 ML by HERMES
description: e d&amp;#39;Hermes by Herm&egrave;s is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Terre d&amp;#39;Hermes was launched in 2006. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean-Claude Ellena. Top notes are Orange and Grapefruit; middle notes are Pepper and Pelargonium; base notes are Vetiver, Cedar, Patchouli and Benzoin. This perfume is the winner of award FiFi Award Fragrance Of The Year Men`s Luxe 2007.

name: Gucci Bloom Eau de Parfum 50ml
description: Gucci Bloom Eau de Parfum is a scent that celebrates authenticity, vitality as well as the diversity of women &mdash; flourishing in a natural, expressive and individual way. Blended by master perfumer Alberto Morillas under the direction of the House&rsquo;s Creative Director, Gucci Bloom is created to unfold like its name, capturing the rich scent of a thriving garden filled with an abundance of flowers. Tuberose and jasmine coupled with Rangoon Creeper &mdash; a unique flower from South India that is for the first time in perfumery to create a rich fragrance that transports the wearer to an imaginary garden. Top notes: jasmine; Heart notes: tuberose; Base notes: rangoon creeper.

name: Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming by DIOR 100ML
description: Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming by Dior is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Francois Demachy. Top notes are Raspberry, Black Currant, Pomegranate and Pink Pepper; middle notes are May Rose and Peony; base note is White Musk. &nbsp;

name: Davidoff Cool Water Eau de Toilette
description: Davidoff Cool Water Eau de Toilette For Men is an original marine fragrance for men, inspired by the freshness of the ocean. Cool Water is the aromatic essence of masculine vitality, power and seduction. An invigorating scent delivers energy as well as audacity. With refreshing top notes of lavender coupled with peppermint, the perfume opens with vibrant and sparkling intensity. The heart notes of sandalwood, geranium together with oakmoss add body and presence to the fragrance. Deeper notes of musk and amber are the base notes that add more intensity as well as an interesting contrast.

name: Mon Paris Eau de Parfum 90ML by YVES SAINT LAURENT
description: Capturing the spirit of an intense love affair, YSL introduces Mon Paris perfume - a new expression of love today, inspired by the city of lovers, Paris. Mon Paris is a fragrance which urges you to seize the moment; transcend the present; and prepare to fall head over heels into the arms of a passionate love. A subversive reinvention of the traditional chypre, the new floral perfume turns the traditional model upside down, by introducing a brave, bold narcotic white chypre fit for love today.

name: Red Wood DSQUARED2 For Women
description: Red Wood by DSQUARED2&nbsp;is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Red Wood was launched in 2019. Top notes are Cranberry and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Litchi, Magnolia and Rose; base notes are Cedar, Amberwood and Musk.

name: L'Eau D'Issey Pour Homme Issey Miyake
description: L&amp;#39;Eau d&amp;#39;Issey Pour Homme by Issey Miyake is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for men. L&amp;#39;Eau d&amp;#39;Issey Pour Homme was launched in 1994. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier. Top notes are Yuzu, Lemon, Bergamot, Lemon Verbena, Mandarin Orange, Cypress, Calone, Coriander, Tarragon and Sage; middle notes are Blue Lotus, Nutmeg, Lily-of-the-Valley, Saffron, Ceylon Cinnamon, Bourbon Geranium and Mignonette; base notes are Tahitian Vetiver, Musk, Cedar, Sandalwood, Tobacco and Amber.

name: Acqua di Giò Absolu Giorgio Armani
description: Acqua di Gi&ograve; Absolu by Giorgio Armani is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Acqua di Gi&ograve; Absolu was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Sea Notes, Bergamot, Pear, Grapefruit, Apple and Lemon; middle notes are Lavender, Geranium and Rosemary; base notes are Woody Notes, Tonka Bean, Patchouli, Amberwood and Labdanum.

name: Kenzo World EDP by KENZO
description: Kenzo World by Kenzo is a Floral fragrance for women. Kenzo World was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top note is Red Fruits; middle notes are Peony, Floral Notes and Egyptian Jasmine; base note is Ambroxan.

name: Ouverture Xerjoff Velvet Collection
description: Ouverture by Xerjoff is a Amber Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ouverture was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice. Top notes are Fig Leaf, Orange and Magnolia; middle notes are Indian Jasmine, Bulgarian Rose, Cinnamon and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla, Cashmere Wood, Amber and Incense.

name: Metallique Tom Ford
description: Metallique by Tom Ford is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Metallique was launched in 2019. Top notes are Aldehydes, Pink Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Heliotrope, Hawthorn and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Vanilla, Ambrette (Musk Mallow), Peru Balsam and Sandalwood.

name: 212 VIP Rosé Red Carolina Herrera
description: 212 VIP Ros&eacute; Red by Carolina Herrera is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. 212 VIP Ros&eacute; Red was launched in 2020. Top notes are Liquor, Tomato and Raspberry; middle notes are Tiramisu, Spices and Bulgarian Rose; base notes are Patchouli, Musk and Woody Notes.

name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue EDT for Women
description: Dolce &amp;amp;amp; Gabbana Light Blue&nbsp;perfume has combination of lively Sicilian citron and effervescent Granny Smith Apples, are softened and ethereally blended with the intensity of freesia, jasmine, earthy musk and amber Dolce &amp;amp;amp; Gabbana Light Blue is a stunning fragrance&nbsp;that&amp;#39;s both overwhelming and irresistible, like the joy of living

name: Wood for Her DSQUARED2
description: Wood for Her by DSQUARED2&nbsp;is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Wood for Her was launched in 2018. Top notes are Raspberry Leaf, Mandarin Orange, Magnolia and Lily-of-the-Valley; middle notes are Osmanthus and Jasmine; base notes are White Woods, Ambroxan and Cedar.

name: Noir Extreme Tom Ford (TESTER BOX)
description: Noir Extreme by Tom Ford is a Amber Woody fragrance for men. Noir Extreme was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Sonia Constant. Top notes are Cardamom, Nutmeg, Saffron, Mandarin Orange and Neroli; middle notes are Kulfi, Rose, Jasmine, Mastic or Lentisque and Orange Blossom; base notes are Vanilla, Amber, Woody Notes and Sandalwood.

name: Diptyque 34 L'Eau Du Trente-Quatre
description: From the 34 Boulevard Satin-Germain collection celebrating diptyque&amp;#39;s 50th anniversary, 34 L&amp;#39;Eau du Trent-Quatre Eau de Toilette captures the scent of the first boutique during spring, when the weather changes and the greenest notes take over the warmer and sensual notes. Style: Green, woody, floral. Notes: grapefruit, bitter orange, fig leaves, galbanum, Egyptian, geranium, tuberose, cinnamon, nutmeg, cedarwood, vetiver, white musk.

name: Good Girl Légère Carolina Herrera (TESTER BOX)
description: Good Girl L&eacute;g&egrave;re by Carolina Herrera is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Good Girl L&eacute;g&egrave;re was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Louise Turner. Top notes are Ylang-Ylang, Mandarin Orange, Lemon and Bergamot; middle notes are Jasmine, Tuberose, Orange Blossom and Bulgarian Rose; base notes are Dulce de leche, Tonka Bean, Praline, Cinnamon, Sandalwood, Cashmirwood, Amber, Musk, Patchouli and Cedar.
